summary: THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE # 02V289000 FROM THE MANUFACTURER IN FEBRUARY 2003.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR REPAIRS.  THE DEALER STATED NO PARTS WERE AVAILABLE AND WOULD CALL THE CONSUMER WHEN THE PARTS BECAME AVAILABLE.  THE CONSUMER STILL HAS NOT RECEIVED A CALL FROM THE DEALER.  *NLM
